description:
Asamiya Ryuuto, as Odin, was the leader and the strongest member of Ragnarok. He is currently a member of YOMI and has mastered Seikuuken, a technique which allows him to create a barrier that can neutralize attacks.
Ryuuto was Ken`ichi`s friend when they were young, before Ken`ichi moved out of the neighborhood. They witnessed Miu`s martial arts skills when they were six years old, prompting them to make a vow to become stronger. He had coveted the Yin-Yang badge Miu gave to Ken`ichi and challenges him to fight for its possession. Ryuuto defeats Ken`ichi and takes the badge.
name: Asamiya Ryuuto
